Class ParticleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticleManager

  • public class ParticleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to store information about the particle manager for a firework star simulation.

    The time interval, the current time, the star, and the Runge Kutta Solver are stored.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    zackh_000

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticleManager

        public ParticleManager(double timeInterval,
                       Star fireworkStar,
                       RungeKuttaSolver rKSolver)
                throws IllegalTimeIntervalException
        The constructor for the ParticleManager class.
        Parameters:
        timeInterval - The time interval, in seconds, that will be used for the simulation.
        fireworkStar - The Star object that will be used for the simulation.
        rKSolver - The RungeKuttaSolver object that will be used to solve the simulation.
        Throws:
        IllegalTimeIntervalException - if the timeInteval was not greater than 0 and less than or equal to 0.05

    • Method Detail

      • setDeltaT

        public void setDeltaT(double interval)
        The mutator for deltaT.
        Parameters:
        interval - The new time interval that will be used in the simulation.

      • getPath

        public double[][] getPath(double vxInitial,
                          double vyInitial,
                          double vWind)
        The method used to solve for the x and y position of the star at given different launch velocities.
        Parameters:
        vxInitial - The initial x velocity, not taking into account wind velocity.
        vyInitial - The initial y velocity.
        vWind - The wind velocity in the environment around the star.
        Returns:
        The x and y positions of the star at different times.
